gloss: a very powerful blow with the fist
a distinctive emotional aura experienced instinctively

the act of pressing; the exertion of pressure
a gesture involving the shoulders / an articulatory gesture made by turning the tip of the tongue back against the roof of the mouth / move (one's fist)
hit a glancing blow with the edge of the bat / hit repeatedly / strike with, or as if with a baseball bat
give a base on balls to / hit a glancing blow with the edge of the bat
an effortful attempt to attain a goal / make an attempt at achieving something / make an attempt at something
